issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: plea for a nice error message for euca-migrate-instances

comments.body:
If nothing else we could fix this in the client as the error message is correct :)
Late in the game for changes!
The client has no idea what the source machine is when you ask it to move a specific instance like [~mdshaonimran] just did.

Code Review Request :EUCA-6367 plea for a nice error message for euca-migrate-instances (Cluster Controller Code)

branch : dev-mmunn1-EUCA-6367


diff :  git show --color de0b95570f99d9a9fb2ab98109ac2764eb7da2c5

Summary: we were returning a generic error message for there separate goto cases "not enough resources available for migration" in handles.schedule_instance_migration 

Solution:  return a specific and user informative message for each case.

New Error Message : 

[g-15-09:/opt]euca-migrate-instances -i i-ee62ec74  --dest 10.111.5.129
Error(InternalFailure): Migrating instance i-ee62ec74 failed because of: source and destination cannot be the same
[g-15-09:/opt]
           
Unit test : described in comments, I have created a Eutester testcase for this issue at: /eutester/testcases/cloud_admin/4-1/EUCA-6367

Hi,

The invalid migration commands fail after a long time.

{noformat}
real	1m25.057s
user	0m0.097s
sys	0m0.013s
{noformat}

Also, it only returns the correct response for the issue described in the description when the source node and destination node is same.
{noformat}
[root@e-18 ~]# time euca-migrate-instances -i i-f77fa343 --dest 10.111.1.67 --debug

{noformat}

But it returns no error while trying to migrate an instance to a different cluster.
{noformat}
[root@e-18 ~]# time euca-migrate-instances -i i-f77fa343 --dest 10.111.1.42
Error(InternalFailure): Migrating instance i-f77fa343 failed because of: ERROR
